title: Saudi Arabia Sophisticated Urban Retreat Minutes from Al Khobar
description: Minutes from the Khobar Corniche and Mall of Dhahran, the voco Al Khobar, an IHG Hotel is an oasis of rest and relaxation in the midst of a bustling cosmopolitan city. Savour satisfying global cuisines at the multiple onsite restaurants, indulge in a soothing treatment at the Soul Wellness and Spa or relish a refreshing swim in the pool. After experiencing the best this Saudi Arabian city has to offer, retire to a sophisticated room for a well-deserved slumber.
location_description: voco Al Khobar, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Dhahran Road, Al-Thuqbah, King Abdullah Street, Al Khobar 31952, Saudi Arabia

title: Al Khobar Corniche Escape with Indoor Pool, Spa & Gourmet Restaurant
description:
Experience refined Arabian coastal living at this Mövenpick retreat nestled along Al Khobar’s scenic Corniche, overlooking the shimmering waters of the Gulf. Relax in style in the hotel's spacious rooms and suites, featuring chic interiors, marble bathrooms and world-class amenities. Take a leisurely dip in the naturally lit indoor pool and pamper with soothing treatments and massages at the spa.

Dining is a delight with plenty of options: savour innovative Indian delicacies at Maharaja by Vineet, helmed by a Michelin-starred chef, relish international buffets at The Blue Restaurant and sip on refreshing mocktails from The View Lounge, paired with sea views. Just a short stroll from the Al Khobar Corniche and lively malls, this hotel is an ideal base for blending culture and coastal exploration.
offer_address: Prince Turkey Street, Al Yarmouk, Al Khobar 31952, Saudi Arabia

title: Al Khobar Five-Star City Centre Retreat
description: Near the shores of the Arabian Gulf, Crowne Plaza Al Khobar, an IHG Hotel is a refined urban oasis with a central city location only minutes from the sea. Embark on a gastronomic journey to Morocco at Marrakesh restaurant, or indulge in a sweet treat and a coffee at the Rendezvous Tea Lounge. Escape the heat with a dip in the indoor pool, or invigorate body and mind at the fitness centre. After exploring this dynamic Saudi Arabian city, retire to a spacious suite to rest in comfort and style.
location_description: Crowne Plaza al Khobar, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: King Abdullah Street, Al-Thuqbah, Al Khobar 31952, Saudi Arabia

title: Stylish Al Khobar Villas with Private Lagoon Beach, Outdoor Pool & Wellness Spa
description:
Indulge in coastal luxury at this five-star all-villa resort where warm Arabian hospitality meets a beachfront paradise on the tranquil shores of Al Khobar. Tuck into exquisite cuisine at Azure Restaurant, where panoramic Gulf views pair perfectly with fresh seafood and international delights, or enjoy a refreshing drink at La Casa Club.

Unwind by the outdoor pool, explore the private lagoon beach or rejuvenate at the serene wellness spa before retreating to the comfort of your spacious villa. Mövenpick Al Khobar Beach invites you to experience resort-style living at its finest.
offer_address: Half Moon Bay Road, Aziziyah, Al Khobar 31952, Saudi Arabia

title: Saudi Arabia Sophisticated City Break with Rooftop Swimming Pool
description: Discover for yourself true Arabic hospitality at the InterContinental Al Khobar, an IHG Hotel, where modern conveniences meet traditional design and customs. Escape the heat of Saudi Arabia with a dip in the rooftop swimming pool, book yourself in for a pampering treatment at the day spa, and sample the hotel's famous date pudding at T. Square. For a global gourmet expedition, dine at Twist restaurant, an international buffet and show kitchen featuring themed nights and a decadent dessert station.
location_description: InterContinental al Khobar, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Ibn Bassam Al Andalusi St, Al Bandariyah, Al Khobar 31952, Saudi Arabia

vendor_name: Kempinski Al Othman Hotel Al Khobar
title: Five-Star Saudi Arabia Kempinski Stay in the Centre of Al Khobar
description: Between resplendent red sands and the shimmering bright blue of the Arabian Gulf stands the iconic twin towers of Kempinski Al Othman Hotel Al Khobar, a five-star oasis of opulence. Perfectly located at the junction between Khobar, Dharan and Dammam, the hotel is only a short drive from some of Saudi Arabia's best attractions. With five dining venues, a cigar lounge and a world-class spa equipped with Moroccan bath chambers, Kempinski Al Othman Hotel Al Khobar is the perfect starting point to explore the region's wealth of historical, cultural and architectural treasures.
location_description: Kempinski Al Othman Hotel Al Khobar
offer_address: King Saud Bin Abdulaziz Rd, Al Qashlah, Dhahran 34232, Saudi Arabia
